Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. I believe it would be a great fit for you and I'm confident you'll find its benefits invaluable. Considering its quality and the value it provides, I'm offering it to you for $140. This price reflects my commitment to making high-quality products accessible while ensuring a fair return on investment for me. I hope you'll consider this offer and take advantage of this opportunity to enhance your experience with our product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $140. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $140
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
